text: Roia or ROIA may refer to: * Roia (Kiba), a character in the anime Kiba * Roia (river), a river in Italy and France * Radio One (company), an American broadcasting corporation * Râoaia River, a river in Romania * Restoration of Order in Ireland Act 1920 * Rural Oahu Interscholastic Association ==See also== * Roya (disambiguation)
title: Roia
